job_tasks.phrase: Het ontwerpen en implementeren van AI-architecturen gebaseerd op large language models (LLMs) zoals GPT en andere geavanceerde AI-modellen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the design and implementation of AI architectures specifically based on LLMs, which falls under model development and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Het bouwen van schaalbare AI-oplossingen en het ontwerpen van flexibele, toekomstbestendige architecturen voor cloudomgevingen zoals Azure
job_tasks.justification: This describes building scalable solutions and designing architectures for cloud environments, which are core software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Het ontwikkelen en beheren van AI-modellen, van proof-of-concept tot productie, waarbij je zorgt voor naadloze integratie en deployment op cloudplatforms
job_tasks.justification: This covers the end-to-end lifecycle of AI models, including management, integration, and deployment on cloud platforms, aligning with MLOps principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Het toepassen van vaardigheden in prompt engineering om LLMs te optimaliseren en aan te passen aan specifieke klantbehoeften en use-cases
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions prompt engineering for optimizing and adapting LLMs, which is a key task in GenAI specialization.

job_tasks.phrase: Het combineren van GenAI-kennis met traditionele machine learning-technieken en frameworks zoals Python , TensorFlow , en PyTorch om hybride AI-oplossingen te realiseren.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of hybrid AI solutions by combining GenAI with traditional ML techniques and specific frameworks.

job_tasks.phrase: Het bouwen en beheren van API's voor AI-diensten, inclusief API-management en beveiliging.
job_tasks.justification: Building and managing APIs for AI services is a core software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met klanten en interne teams om hun AI-behoeften te begrijpen en te vertalen naar waardevolle, data-gedreven oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding client needs and translating them into solutions, which falls under business understanding and strategy.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met klanten en interne teams om hun AI-behoeften te begrijpen en te vertalen naar waardevolle, data-gedreven oplossingen.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes a balanced mix of core software engineering tasks (building scalable solutions, designing architectures, managing APIs, deployment on cloud) and GenAI specialization tasks (designing LLM architectures, prompt engineering, combining GenAI with traditional ML). The explicit mention of LLMs, GPT, prompt engineering, and frameworks like TensorFlow/PyTorch in the context of GenAI points towards a Core GenAI Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the tasks and technologies involved, directly mapping to the definitions in the coding book. The responsibilities clearly indicate a blend of software engineering and GenAI specialization.
